ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Fire on High" <scendera@o...>
wrote:
> Mine's a 64 meg and I manage fairly well in most places, even more
with
> things like sky and spell particles turned off. I have about half
the

Thanks very much for that. In fact I was just about to ask the
question of 64MB v 128Mb cards. I have been shopping around and can
get a 128Mb ATI Radeon based card or a 64MB nVidia GEForce.

Is there any difference with EQ between ATI and nVidia graphics?

What sort of loading and zoning times should I ideally see?

I am still trying to understand why the graphic controller should
slow down loading and zoning - I can see why it would affect game
play.

Thanks again.

Regards.
